name: 蕭名宏
objective: 1.簡介 2.網路定律及元件 3.電路分析簡介 4.節點電壓及迴路電流 5.網路特性 6.一階電路 7.二階電路 8.線性非時變電路 9.電力網路與穩定度分析 10.電路幾何學
schedule:
1	Circuit Variables and Laws
2	Circuit Variables and Laws
3	Properties of Resistive Circuits
4	Properties of Resistive Circuits
5	Applications of Resistive Circuits
6	Applications of Resistive Circuits
7	第1次期中考Systematic Analysis Methods
8	Systematic Analysis Methods
9	Systematic Analysis Methods
10	Energy Storage and Dynamic Circuits
11	Energy Storage and Dynamic Circuits
12	Ac Circuits
13	第2次期中考 Ac Circuits
14	Ac Power and Three-Phase Circuits
15	Ac Power and Three-Phase Circuits
16	Mutual Inductance and Transformers
17	Transient Response
18	期末考
scorePolicy: 上課表現10%, 兩次期中考各佔25%, 期末考40%
materials: Circuits, by A. Bruce Carlson, 歐亞書局
